attributes.action: Require OfSTED to supply details of applicants intending to register under the childcare act 2006 to be shared with Local Authorities and/or Family Information Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Details of applicants submitted to OfSTED prior to them becoming registered being shared with Local Authorities and/or Family Information Services will help in the provision of a informed brokerage service (section 12) of possible registered childcare providers who may become registered at a later date who may provide a childcare place for a child within the authority; further to this it will also help in the provision of information to help inform the childcare sufficiency assessments in the provision of potential childcare which stops wasting potential monies in the development of further childcare places/settings.
